      public VcfRecordBuilder id(String id)
      Identifier: Semicolon-separated list of unique identifiers where available If this is a dbSNP/dbVAR variant these rsID/nsvID(s) should be used.
      Parameters:
      id - identifier for this variant

    • pass

      public VcfRecordBuilder pass()
      If this method is called, "PASS" is added to the FILTER column

    • filter

      public VcfRecordBuilder filter(String filter)
      Parameters:
      filter - FILTER field of VCF. calling pass() is equivant to calling filter("PASS)
